content_block_programmatic.name: OneSearch Embed
content_block_programmatic.programmatic_content: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?> <!-- The embedded OneSearch widget generally provides a better user experience --> <!-- in a CMS environment. In order to use: --> <!-- 1) Add this content block to your CMS layout. --> <!-- 2) Set your OneSearch searcher to type 'Other (by URL)'. --> <!-- 3) Edit the 'Page identifier' field to match the searcher location. --> <j:jelly trim="false" xmlns:j="jelly:core" xmlns:g="glide" xmlns:j2="null" xmlns:g2="null"> <g:macro_invoke macro="sn_onesearch_onesearch_widget" /> </j:jelly>
